items.text:
You track the yeti as you did before. As you get close, its figure slips
behind a nearby tree. You’re sure that there was no way a being that
large could hide behind that tree. But when you approach, it’s gone
yet again.
IF KORDO, RANGER VETERAN IS IN PLAY GO TO

You turn, and a familiar form is standing before you. The yeti spreads
both of its arms and reaches toward you, its furry hands hovering
centimeters over your shoulders. Then it lowers its arms. Hesitantly,
you stretch out your arms and do the same to it. The yeti hoots softly,
a sound that seems somehow satisfied to you. Then it steps back and
walks off into the forest. You feel a sense of calm knowing that you
have a friend in these woods.
